channel.title: Random Pokemon Generator Feed
channel.description: Learn about updates to the website.

item.title: Add random shiny pokemon generator and random mega pokemon generator
item.description: I'm happy to announce a new update to the Random Pokemon Generator. I've added shiny pokemon generator and mega pokemon generator. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/tools/random-shiny-pokemon-generator, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: Add generation pokemon list
item.description: I'm happy to announce a new update to the Random Pokemon Generator. I've added a list of all the generation pokemon to the generator, so you can generate any generation pokemon you want. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: Add more rarity options to the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: I'm happy to announce a new update to the Random Pokemon Generator. I've added more rarity options to the generator, including subLegendary, Legendary, Mythical,Paradox, and UltraBeast. These options will allow you to generate more varied and interesting Pokémon. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: Convert images to webp, reduce size and optimize for web
item.description: I Converted all the images to webp format, reduced the size of the images, and optimized them for web. This will accelerate the loading time of the sprite images. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: We've launched our blog.
item.description: We've launched our blog, check it out at https://randompokegen.cc/blog. We'll be posting regular updates and tutorials on how to use the Random Pokemon Generator. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: New Documentation for the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: We're excited to announce the release of detailed documentation that provides a complete overview of our random Pokémon generator. By migrating to Next.js + Nextra, we've been able to create a more modern and user-friendly website with significantly faster load times. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: Options Reset and Shiny pokemons!
item.description: As the title says, i add two new features to the Random Pokemon Generator. The first one is the ability to reset the options to the default values; the second one is the ability to save shiny pokemons that you encountered, you can view them in the "Shiny Pokemons" section at the bottom of the page. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: A big update to the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: A really big update !! I added a lot more filter options and many show options, and improved the showing of pokemons, to make it more fun and interesting. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: A big update to the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: I added a lot more filters to the Random Pokemon Generator, and i hope it useful for you. Go try it now https://randompokegen.cc/, hope you have fun. Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: Add More Option panel for the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: I added a More-Option-Panel to the Random Pokemon Generator, to make it easier to operate and Keep a clean and simple interface! Hope you like it! Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

item.title: More Filters for the Random Pokemon Generator
item.description: I added more filters to the Random Pokemon Generator, including a filter for the region of the Pokemon, the ability of the Pokemon, and the type of the Pokemon.

item.title: A new Random Pokemon Generator borned
item.description: I'm happy to announce the birth of a new Random Pokemon Generator! This website is a project I've been working on for a while, and I'm excited to see it grow and become more useful to the community.
